title: YouTubers ride Korean Wave : International content creators discuss their success and future plans
text: From left: Popular YouTubers Emil from “EmilTUBE,” Whitney from “Whitneybae” and Kyuho from “2hearts1seoul” pose at a YouTube event in Gangnam, southern Seoul. [YOUTUBE] Korea takes bronze twice in soft tennis after back-to-back losses to Japan Korean kabaddi teams end Games empty-handed and out of breath Oriental Brewery increases beer prices as expenses escalate Tightening the safety belt Negative reaction To write comments, please log in to one of the accounts.
